reviews.review_msg: Adam is definitely tough. The material itself is VERY straightforward, but his exams were TRICKY. Overall Adam was really chill, easy going, and helpful. Brought in guest speakers from VPD and RCMP that held recruiting sessions which was cool if you're looking to work/volunteer in policing. Group work in lectures was fun and made class more excitin
Great prof!! Funny, approachable, and down to earth. Made a 3-hour Monday night lecture informative and enjoyable.
Awesome prof, funny and just an overall great teacher, would take another class with him if given the chance.
One of the best prof's I've ever had, fair marker and very clear in his teachings.
